progetto.network

Class ServerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.network.ServerConnection

  • final class ServerConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    The class server connection is the class that uses the various implementation of INetworkHandler to perform the room and server level behaviour. It requires an already built INetworkHandler to be created, since it cannot know how connection are established.

    • Method Detail

      • offerRequest

        private void offerRequest(IRoomRequest req)
        appends a request to the pending request queue
        Parameters:
        req - the request to be appended

      • isRunning

        boolean isRunning()
        Returns:
        true if the underlying implementation is still running

      • popRequest

        IRoomRequest popRequest()
        Returns:
        the oldest pending request popping it.

      • peekRequest

        IRoomRequest peekRequest()
        Returns:
        the oldest pending request without popping it.

      • getPlayerID

        int getPlayerID()
        Returns:
        the player if of this player. -1 if the player creation has not been processed by server.

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Tries to send a message to the client. Can be called from any thread, since the underlying implementation must ensure that messages are thread safe. There is no requirements for this message to be received in order.
        Parameters:
        message - the message that must be sent.

      • setID

        void setID(int id)
        sets the player id. Should be called only by the id manager, and only once. notifies the other end that id has changed.
        Parameters:
        id - the new id of the player.

      • sendID

        void sendID()
        forces the client to change his player info.

      • onRoomModified

        void onRoomModified(RoomView r)
        notifies the client with the new values of the room
        Parameters:
        r - the room view that must be sent.

      • onRoomChanged

        void onRoomChanged(ISync ogg)
        notifies that the player is no longer in the previous room, and that the sync object is therefore changed.
        Parameters:
        ogg - the new sync object

      • checkSynch

        void checkSynch(ISync ogg)
        forces the player to check if the syncobject is still synced
        Parameters:
        ogg - the server side version of the object

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        tries to tear down the connection gracefully

      • sendServerState

        void sendServerState(ServerStateView state)
        forces the player to update his information about the server state.
        Parameters:
        state - the server state that must be sent.

      • sendSyncCommand

        void sendSyncCommand(java.io.Serializable s)
        forces the client to append a synch string to his sync object.
        Parameters:
        s - the string to be sent
